meaning_str.bing:
n. 港口；〈英〉门；舱门；机场
v. 【计】移植；持(枪)；转(舵)向左；转舵向左
网络. 端口；埠；端口号

【计】移植；持(枪)；转(舵)向左；转舵向左

港口；口岸；海港；左舷（船或飞机的左侧）；开口；缝隙；避风港；港市；波特酒（一种加烈葡萄酒）；枪支携带姿势；姿态；软件移植；接口（计算机或网络设备上的连接点）
使船或舵向左转；携带；扛（枪）；移植软件；改编软件

1.en: It left the North Korean port of Nampo a week ago and is believed bound for Myanmar, South Korean and U. S. officials said.
1.cn: 韩国及美国的官员们表示，一周之前该船从朝鲜南浦港出发并被认为驶往缅甸。

2.en: So let me close by asking you to remember the little girl who was pulled from the rubble on Monday in Port-au-Prince.
2.cn: 在结束今天的讲话时，我要请你们记住星期一在太子港的废墟中获救的那个小女孩。

3.en: 'We're really selling the port, ' said the governor. 'We're going to have a great opportunity to do more Norfolk-to-Shanghai trade. '
3.cn: 麦克唐纳说，“这个港口的确是个很好的卖点。我们有很好的机会来推动诺福克跟上海之间更多的贸易往来。”

0.en: It's the biggest port in the world.
0.cn: 它是世界上最大的港口。

1.en: For two centuries, Dubai was not much more than a tiny trading port on the banks of Dubai Creek.
1.cn: 两个世纪以来，迪拜都只是迪拜河岸的小交易港口。

2.en: It's like a one-man reign of terror. This bat vigilante has been consistently targeting the port and the adjacent projects and tenements.
2.cn: 这就像恐怖统治，这位蝙蝠义警总是出现在港口以及周围的民宅和廉租房。

3.en: I tried to port round it, but she hit.
3.cn: 再右转想避开，可是还是撞上了。

4.en: My purpose is to heal, the sick and injured. Baymax, open your access port.
4.cn: 我的功能是去疗伤，帮助病号和伤员，大白，打开你的插卡器。

5.en: He doesn't need them. He's already got a six-port Ethernet switch. Oh, okay, then this one.
5.cn: 他不需要，他已经有一台六个以太网接口的交换机了。好吧，那这个。

6.en: Harold. The port used to hack Khan's system sent a small amount of data back to an off-site I.P. Address.
6.cn: 哈罗德，黑可汗系统的端口发了少量数据到外边的一个IP地址。

7.en: I'm glad. I guess you devised the fuzzy driving software for the T-Port? Yes. You are correct in your guess.
7.cn: 那就好，我猜是你为便携科技设计了驾驶软件？是的，你猜得没错。

8.en: No one has ever died or been injured in any car accident caused by my t-port. That would be news to my client.
8.cn: 目前还没有关于我的便携科技的伤亡事故记录。可这对于我的委托人来说却是全新的。

9.en: It's located at one end of a 34-kilometre bridge, on an island in the open sea which was razed to build a freshwater port.
9.cn: 一座34公里长的桥连接着这个城市，其所在地曾是远海上一座岛 后被人类夷平了来建淡水港。

10.en: But if you look beyond this port, you'll see something very different. Manufacturing is not really disappearing from America.
10.cn: 但是你看看别的地方，你将看到不同的东西，制造业并不是真正从美国消失了。

11.en: Mr. Ephraham, is rain one of those road conditions that the t-port needs to learn how to negotiate? It knows how to negotiate rain.
11.cn: 以法连先生，下雨天是不是也属于便携科技需要学习适应的一种路面状况？它已经可以在下雨天行驶了。

12.en: All right. What is in the safe? Something for you. Maurice always said it was his most precious gift to you. A will. Maurice's will is with Port and Dunn.
12.cn: 箱内有什么东西？是给你的，令尊说过 那是给你最珍贵的礼物，一份遗嘱。他的遗嘱在律师那里。

13.en: This is the man who knows things. Anatoli Knyazev. He's Russian. Contracts all over the globe, but he's based out of the port of Gotham. Weapons and human trafficking.
13.cn: 这个人可不一样，安纳托利·尼克亚杰夫，俄罗斯人，受雇于全球各地，但他的大本营就在哥谭港外，搞武器和人口走私。

14.en: Good afternoon, mr. Ephraham. Good afternoon. In 2014 you told wired magazine that the t-port had "The most advanced AI software on the market. Every day it's learning something new." What does that mean?
14.cn: 下午好，以法连先生。下午好。2014年，你对《连线》杂志说便携科技拥有「市场上最先进的人工智能软件每一天，它都在学习新的东西。」这是什么意思？
